mapper.select: /* bbs-type.list */ select hbtype.hong_bbs_type_uid as hong_bbs_type_uid ,hbtype.bbs_type_cd as bbs_type_cd ,hcode.code_nm as bbs_type_nm ,hcode.memo_cn as bbs_cd -- notice, faq, qna ,hbtype.bbs_nm as bbs_nm ,hbtype.cmnt_use_yn as cmnt_use_yn ,hbtype.file_atch_yn as file_atch_yn ,case when hbtype.cmnt_use_yn = 'Y' then '사용' else '미사용' end as cmnt_use_yn_str ,case when hbtype.file_atch_yn = 'Y' then '사용' else '미사용' end as file_atch_yn_str ,case when hbtype.use_yn = 'Y' then '사용' else '미사용' end as use_yn_str ,hbtype.use_yn as use_yn ,huser.user_nm as reg_name ,to_char(hbtype.reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as reg_dt from hong_bbs_type hbtype left join hong_user huser on huser.user_uid = hbtype.reg_id left join hong_code hcode on hcode.code_val = hbtype.bbs_type_cd and hcode.upper_code_val = 'BBS_TYPE' and hcode.use_yn = 'Y' and hcode.del_yn = 'N' where hbtype.del_yn = 'N'
/* bbs-type.view */ select hong_bbs_type_uid ,bbs_type_cd ,bbs_nm ,cmnt_use_yn ,file_atch_yn ,use_yn from hong_bbs_type where hong_bbs_type_uid = #{hongBbsTypeUid}
/* bbs-type.latestBbsType */ select hong_bbs_type_uid from hong_bbs_type where bbs_type_cd = #{bbsTypeCd} and use_yn = 'Y' and del_yn = 'N' order by reg_dt desc limit 1
